commit.message:
dump-parse-tree.c (show_code): Add prototype.

2016-11-14  Thomas Koenig  <tkoenig@gcc.gnu.org>

	* dump-parse-tree.c (show_code):  Add prototype.
	(gfc_debug_code):  New function.
	(show_code_node):  Add space after SELECT TYPE.

From-SVN: r242393
